title: The Wolf Within
description: Most anyone would’ve thought ‘stealing’ their boss’ seed was a really bad idea, even though Brooke had no intention of ever letting him know what she’d done. But Brooke figured what the heck? She needed a donor and nobody stacked up to Dorian as far as she was concerned. She didn’t have evil designs on him. Short Story Paranormal/Werewolf Romance Erotica
author: Mandy Monroe
